title: Sonic The Hedgehog 2 - Movie Review
description:
Thanks to Sony Electronics for sponsoring this video! Go to https://bit.ly/3LnWpXG to check out Sony’s HT-A5000 Soundbar and 360 Spatial Sound mapping for yourself!

Sonic The Hedgehog was a surprise to be sure, but a welcome one. Now the sequel brings Tails and Knuckles into the fold. Does it hold up? Here's my review of SONIC THE HEDGEHOG 2!

#SonicTheHedgehog2
